title: Why I hate (playing against) Yasuo
body: Have you ever seen a top 5 plays clip (in machinimarealm) of someone outplaying Yasuo? I haven't. When you see a Yasuo, it's always a top 5 plays about Yasuo or a top 5 fails about Yasuo.

replies.body: Well, have you seen a "top 5 outplays" video of any champion?

That's a horrendous argument.
Why watch one single champion being continually outplayed? 
You can just watch a diamond smurf in bronze if you want to see that...
That's the weakest argument I have ever seen in an anti-yasuo thread.

Yes, I have seen those clips before :P

It's usually flashing a point blank tornado.

Come on Dr. Poro, you've made better threads than this.

Continue your quest for ARAM reform, you make good arguments there.
We all know Yasuo is almost as brainless as his mains, but this argument is pretty weak.
